data:
{
  "text_recommendations": "Analysis Report:

Based on your height (160.0 cm), which falls into the 160-166 cm range,
here are personalized style recommendations:

Tops:
- Vertical stripes or monochrome outfits will elongate your frame visually.
- Shorter-length jackets and shirts that hit just above the hip are ideal.
- Avoid oversized layers; opt for structured fits.

Bottoms:
- Slim or skinny jeans/pants will provide a sleeker look.
- Cropped or ankle-length trousers can enhance height perception.

Shoes:
- Chelsea boots or slight heel shoes give a refined lift.
- Avoid bulky footwear that may disrupt body proportion.

Accessories:
- Narrow belts will avoid cutting the body line horizontally.
- Choose minimal backpacks or crossbody bags.

Color Sense:
- Monochrome dressing in darker shades enhances vertical lines.
- Avoid high-contrast top and bottom pairing.

Recommended Color Combinations:
1. Charcoal shirt with dark gray jeans
2. Navy T-shirt with black pants
3. Olive shirt with charcoal chinos
4. All-black outfit with brown shoes
5. Beige T-shirt with khaki pants
",
  "top_wear_search_engine_query": "vertical striped shirts for men",
  "bottom_wear_search_engine_query": "cropped pants for short men",
  "shoes_search_engine_query": "chelsea boots for men",
  "color_recommendations_search_engine_query": "monochrome outfits for short men"
}
